entry.def: Rechargeable batteries can be recharged and used again. Some electrical products are described as rechargeable when they contain rechargeable batteries.

auth_sentence.content: Unlike batteries, however, fuel cells are almost endlessly rechargeable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike batteries, however, fuel cells are almost endlessly rechargeable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike batteries, however, fuel cells are almost endlessly rechargeable.
